athurudahan wuwange karyalaya wisin soyaganna thorathuru ema panathe 13(1)(e) waganthiya yatathe adala nithiya kriyathmaka kirime, nathinam parichodaka aayathanaya wetha yomu kala haka. 2015 okthobar 14 dina, anka 30/1 darana eksath jathinge manawa himikam kawunsilaye yojanawata anuwa meki athurudahan wuwange karyalaya ‘yatagiyawa gana sewimata’ yahapalana aanduwa wisin pihituwimata ekanga wi athi aayathana kipayakin ekak pamani.
ithin me nagaraye eka pawule inna nawayowun wiye sohoyuriyan dennek hadisiyema athurudahan wenawa.
ohu mata eeta pilithuru gena aawe siri parakum chithrapatayeni.
